title: Apoorva Polki Gundla Haaram - Timeless Elegance
materials: Seed Pearls. Features Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine. Each Polki diamond is hand-selected for its brilliance and unique character.
features: Classic Gundla Haaram design with alternating Polki diamond and Emerald accents. The central pendant features a radiant deity design (Lakshmi or similar), surrounded by meticulously set Polki diamonds and embellished with rubies. Delicate seed pearls are strung along the haaram for a graceful, traditional touch. The Polki setting is expertly crafted with a closed-back setting to enhance the gem's luster.
colors: White (Seed Pearls). This palette represents prosperity and auspiciousness in South Indian culture.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. This haaram adds a touch of regal elegance to any traditional ensemble.
description: This Gundla Haaram is a true heirloom piece, handcrafted by skilled artisans in Hyderabad. The use of high-quality Polki diamonds, emeralds, and seed pearls ensures a timeless beauty and lasting value. The design is inspired by traditional South Indian jewelry, making it a meaningful and culturally significant piece. The Hyderabadi polish guarantees a brilliant, long-lasting shine. It represents the perfect blend of tradition and luxury.
